code: var initialState={userData:[]};export var storeUserData=function storeUserData(payload){return{type:"STORE_DATA",payload:payload};};export var clearUserData=function clearUserData(){return{type:"CLEAR_DATA"};};export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"STORE_DATA":{var payload=action.payload;return{userData:[payload]};}case"CLEAR_DATA":{return{userData:[]};}default:{return state;}}});
